```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(phyloseq)

```

Read in data
```{r}
biom_file = "C:/Users/katmu/Dropbox/Valdivia Lab/Projects/Clinical Isolates/Data/Data_for_analysis/Community_Analysis/second_biom/2020-10-16_update/phyla6_relative-table.tsv"
map_file = "C:/Users/katmu/Dropbox/Valdivia Lab/Projects/Clinical Isolates/Data/Data_for_analysis/Community_Analysis/second_biom/sample-metadata.txt"

otu_table <- read_delim(biom_file, "\t", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
metadata <- read_delim(map_file, "\t", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
```

Import as phyloseq objects
```{r}
OTU <- otu_table(otu_table, taxa_are_rows = TRUE)
meta <- sample_data(metadata)
```

